languages.text: "Подробностей не знаю, но, полагаю, регламент тот же, что был при Леди Теодоре: личное знакомство, подтверждение союза между династией и арбитрами и обсуждение дел, касающихся десятины".

"I do not know the details, but I would assume the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."
languages.original_text: "Подробностей не знаю, но, полагаю, регламент тот же, что был при Леди Теодоре: личное знакомство, подтверждение союза между династией и арбитрами и обсуждение дел, касающихся десятины".

traits.locale_text: "I do not know the details, but I imagine the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Arbitrators, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."

"I do not know the details, but I would assume the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."

languages.text: 「詳細は分かりませんが、手順はレディ・シオドーラの時と同じだと思われます。つまり、個人的な紹介、王朝と高等裁定局との同盟関係の再確認、そして租税に関する事務的な話し合いです」
languages.original_text: "I do not know the details, but I would assume the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."

traits.locale_text: 「詳細は分かりませんが、手順はレディ・シオドーラの時と同じだと思われます。つまり、個人的な紹介、王朝と高等裁定局との同盟関係の再確認、そして租税に関する事務的な話し合いです」

languages.text: "Ayrıntılara hâkim değilim ancak prosedürün, Leydi Theodora'nın zamanındakiyle aynı olduğunu varsayarsam... Konuşmanız; sırasıyla tanışma aşaması, hanedanlık ile Adeptus Arbites arasındaki müttefikliğin yeniden sağlanması ve aşar ilişkilerinin tartışılması şeklinde ilerleyecektir."
languages.original_text: "I do not know the details, but I would assume the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıntılara hâkim değilim ancak prosedürün, Leydi Theodora'nın zamanındakiyle aynı olduğunu varsayarsam konuşmanız sırasıyla tanışma aşaması, hanedanlık ile Adeptus Arbites arasındaki müttefikliğin yeniden sağlanması ve aşar ilişkilerinin tartışılması şeklinde ilerleyecektir."

languages.text: «No conozco los detalles, pero imagino que el procedimiento es el mismo que en tiempos de lady Theodora: presentación personal, reafirmación de la alianza entre la dinastía y el Adeptus Arbites, y discusión de asuntos relacionados con el diezmo».
languages.original_text: "I do not know the details, but I would assume the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."

traits.locale_text: «No conozco los detalles, pero imagino que el procedimiento es el mismo que en tiempos de lady Theodora: presentación personal, reafirmación de la alianza entre la dinastía y el Adeptus Arbites, y discusión de asuntos relacionados con el diezmo».

languages.text: “我并不清楚细节，但我相信，具体流程应该与西奥多拉夫人的时代没有太多区别。先是进行正式介绍，之后重申王朝与法务部之间的合作关系，最后讨论帝国什一税相关事宜。”
languages.original_text: "I do not know the details, but I would assume the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."

traits.locale_text: “我并不清楚细节，但我相信，具体流程应该与西奥多拉夫人的时代没有太多区别。先是进行正式介绍，之后重申王朝与法务部之间的合作关系，最后讨论帝国什一税相关事宜。”

languages.text: « Je n'en sais pas plus que vous, mais je présume que la procédure n'a pas changé depuis que vous avez succédé à dame Théodora : un entretien en face-à-face visant à réaffirmer l'alliance entre la dynastie et l'Adeptus Arbites et à discuter des modalités de collecte de la dîme. »
languages.original_text: "I do not know the details, but I would assume the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en sais pas plus que vous, mais je présume que la procédure n'a pas changé depuis que vous avez succédé à dame Théodora : un entretien en face-à-face visant à réaffirmer l'alliance entre la dynastie et l'Adeptus Arbites et à discuter des modalités de collecte de la dîme. »

languages.text: "Ich kenne keine Details, würde aber annehmen, das Prozedere ist dasselbe wie zu Lady Theodoras Zeit: eine persönliche Vorstellung, eine Bekräftigung des Bündnisses der Dynastie mit dem Adeptus Arbites und die Besprechung von Angelegenheiten, die den Zehnt betreffen."
languages.original_text: "I do not know the details, but I would assume the procedure is the same as it was in Lady Theodora's time: a personal introduction, a reaffirming of allyship between the dynasty and the Adeptus Arbites, and a discussion of tithe-related affairs."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kenne keine Details, würde aber annehmen, das Prozedere ist dasselbe wie zu Lady Theodoras Zeit: eine persönliche Vorstellung, eine Bekräftigung des Bündnisses der Dynastie mit dem Adeptus Arbites und die Besprechung von Angelegenheiten, die den Zehnt betreffen."
